title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.4 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 59-1.4 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Subpart (rule) the following terms
mean: (a) Commissioner. The

Commissioner of Labor or his/her designee. (b) Consultant. An individual certified by
the Department of Labor as a workplace safety and loss prevention consultant, or, a Department of Labor employee assigned to conduct workplace safety and
loss prevention consultations. (c) Department. The Department of Labor of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
59-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
